data.title: Biography Avril Lavigne - Singer
data.meta_description: Born with the name Avril Ramona Lavigne Whibley complete in Belleville, Ontario, Canada, September 27, 1984, later better known by the name ...
data.text:
Born with the name Avril Ramona Lavigne Whibley complete in Belleville, Ontario, Canada, September 27, 1984, later better known by the name of Avril Lavigne is a pop-punk singer, musician, and actress from Canada. Avril in singing ability have been known since she was 2 years old, when his mother said that Avril has started to come to sing spiritual songs at Church. Avril's family moved to Napanee when she was 5 years old. In 1998, Avril won a competition to sing in official tour Canada, Shania Twain, singer-songwriter. Avril sings Shania titled "What Made You Say That.

At the age of 16 years, Lavigne ahead of him registered by Ken Krongard, an artist and journalist, representative of the record company Arista was. Ken invited Antonio "L.A." To listen song of Avril Reid backs Peter Zizzo's recording studio in New York. Next the first album contract complements Lavigne, Let Go.

Lavigne's Debut Album, Let Go, was released on June 4, 2002 in the United States, occupying the position 2 there, and occupy position 1 in Australia, Canada, United Kingdom, and other countries, with the hits singles, the song "Complicated", "Sk8er Boi", "I'm with You", and "Losing Grip". The Album was very successful and sold more than 17 million worldwide, his 7 million sold in the US.

In 2004, 25 May 2004, Lavigne's second album which was titled Under My Skin with hits singles, the song "Don't Tell Me", "My Happy Ending", "nobody's Home", He Wasn't ", and" Fall to Pieces ".

The Album was followed in the footsteps of successful Let Go, sold 12 million worldwide and 4 million were sold in the US. Avril's third Studio Album The Best Damn Thing, was released on April 17, 2007. The Album was quite surprising, because singing modify the style that Avril was formerly very creamy with a rock and dark colors become more cheerful and colorful pink. This Album has hits song single "Girlfriend", "When you're Gone", "Hot", and "The Best Damn Thing". Avril has been filling several times, including the soundtrack for the film Eragon film with the single "Keep Holding On" and most recently, the movie Alice in Wonderland with the song titled "Alice".

Avril appeared in the film was originally in the movie Over the Hedge as voiced, in which the film was based on the comic of the same name. He teamed up with William Shatner, Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling, Wnda Sykes, Nick Nolte and Steve Carrel. She also starred in the film by Richard Gere, The Flock, as the lover of a perpetrator of a crime, and his third project was Fast Food Nation, based on her favorite book to make a stone nAvril. inscribed in the film Going The Distance and also appeared in an episode of Sabrina, The Teenage movie Witch, featuring the song "Sk8er Boi" with her band.

In Seventeen magazine issue January 2003, Avril admits "I was always snagging a bit of Matt's cheeseburger everynow and again". Also said in an interview afterward, he said not to eat meat, but it doesn't say that she's a vegetarian, sometime a person could see him eating meat seja.

As a teenager he usually plays in the restaurant La Pizzera in Napanee, Ontario. In Unser My Skin Bonez Tour Documentary, he says that pizza with olive toppings is her favorite food, although she doesn't always eat it redundant, because the pizza can damage his voice. Since she is famous and popular in the world of music, the restaurant offers pizza with Avril's name which is a type of pizza favorite Avril, and there is a guest book to fans who will be selected by Avril Lavigne when she visited relatives and friends in the city where he grew up, Napanee.

Avril has a tattoo of a star on her left wrist, which is one style that was used for the first album. The tattoo was made concurrently with tattoos courtesy of Ben Moddy, friend Avril is a former band Evanescence. End of 2004, Avril has a tattoo of a heart-shaped small read with accent hurup'd ' in his right wrist, and is a testament to dedication to

her lover Derick Whibley. Avril and her husband had bought a House for $ 9.5 million u.s. dollars in Bel-Air, which this House Home remains famous couples before, Travis Barker and Shanna Moakle. The House has 8 bedrooms, 10 bathrooms, a work room, elevator, high class kitchen, and garage for 10 cars.

Avril once became romantically have special relationship with former gitarisnya Jesse Colburn, but denied the rumors, and explains that he doesn't have any relationship other than a ' friend ' with him and with other members of the band including Evan Taubenfeld or anyone else. However, Evan is still considered that his best friend is Avril over time and over the world, as he said in the official web page for the band "Q & A", his last band. In the magazine J-14, Avril tells about her first kiss occurred when he was 14 years old.

In 2004, appearing a news that Avril and Hillary Duff quarreled violently. "I read that I was mad at my supossedly for dresssing fans like me" Avril said in the weekly newspaper Quoted. "They quoted Hillary Duff saying ' We need to appreciate her fans and blah, blah, blah. ' I'm like, excuse me? First off, it's not even true. I never said that, and second, who the hell cares what she has to say about my fans? Whatever, Hillary Duff such a goody-goody, such a Mommy's girl ". Recently reported there is a dramatisir between the two of them Maxim party in New York, with a convoluted and complicated when their arrival because unwanted escapes. Avril speaks very rudely, jump roughly and forcing organizers the party to leave the place.

In February 2004, he began to establish a special relationship with singer Deryck Whibley, Canada which is the lead singer/guitarist for the pop punk band Sum 41. On June 27 2005, Avril and Deryck romantic trip to Venice, Italy. The couple married in the Catholic Church with the wedding ceremony was written with about 110 guests witnessed the invitation on July 15, 2006, in a private land in California coastal city of Montecito. When asked if they were ready to be offspring, they say "not right now but somewhere down the road". It is now their relationship is not lasting longer, it is dikarenaan infidelity happens between Deryck with Hilton. Avril was sued for divorce.

Avril Lavigne to hold a concert in Jakarta, Indonesia on April 4, 2005. He also held a concert in Kyoto, Japan in early 2007. At that time she was promoting her new song called Girlfriend and When you're Gone is immediately ranked 1 in the Best Download and rank 3 Oricon Chart in Japan. In 2006, the magazine Business positioning it in a position to Canada-Canada women's 7 most awesome in Hollywood, and in 2007 he won the 9th nominations Jabra Music Contest for Best Band In The World, based on the choice of fans around the world.

Up to now, Lavigne has released 3 studio albums, Let Go (2002) which sold more than 7 million throughout the world with over 9 million in US, Under My Skin (2004) which sold more than 12 million worldwide and 4 million in the U.S., and The Best Damn Thing (2007) which sold more than 9 million and 2.5 million in the US. Lavigne has also produced eight singles internationally, among them are "Complicated", "Sk8er Boi", "I'm with You", "Don't Tell Me", "My Happy Ending", "Girlfriend", "When you're Gone" and "What The Hell". Lavigne has filled the soundtrack for the film Alice in Wonderland with the song titled "Alice". He has been recording an album and hit single selling as much as approximately 45 million worldwide.
